description: If n = p_1^e_1 * ... * p_k^e_k, p_1 < ... < p_k primes, then a(n) = n/p_1^e_1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := n / Power @@ First[FactorInteger[n]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 84}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 12 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a028234 n = n `div` a028233 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 27 2013(PARI) a(n) = {my(f = factor(n)); if (#f~, f[1, 1] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 11 2016
author: _Marc LeBrun_
